scripts.clean: yarn workspaces run clean && rm -rf dist *.tsbuildinfo
scripts.clean:artifacts: find . -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' -o -name '*.js.map' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v dist | xargs rm -f || true
scripts.build:clean: yarn clean && yarn clean:artifacts && yarn build

scripts.build-run: yarn build && yarn workspace x-fidelity run build-run
scripts.test:consistency: yarn build && cd packages/x-fidelity-core && npm test -- --testPathPatterns=consistencyTesting.test.ts --verbose
scripts.test:consistency:baseline: yarn build && cd packages/x-fidelity-core && node -e "require('./dist/test-utils/consistencyTesting.js').generateBaselineReport().then(r => require('fs').writeFileSync('../../consistency-baseline.txt', r))"
scripts.test:consistency:validate: yarn build && cd packages/x-fidelity-core && node dist/test-utils/consistencyTestingCLI.js validate
